# Changelog

## 3.0.0

### Major Changes

- - Refactor styles to use Tailwind CSS across components ([ffd0411](https://github.com/medyll/idae/commit/ffd0411188fbd2f1065b941c21d6071d98707f85)) - 2026-01-18 by @medyll
    - Updated Progress, Rating, Select, Slider, Stepper, Switch, TextField, DataList, Finder, Grouper, Jsoner, List, Loader, Sorter, Drawer, Tabs, and various UI components to import Tailwind CSS styles instead of SCSS.
    - Introduced new Tailwind CSS files for Drawer and Tabs components.
    - Created Tailwind CSS mixins and presets for consistent styling across components.
    - Removed legacy SCSS styles and replaced them with Tailwind utility classes.
    - Enhanced the main CSS file to integrate Tailwind CSS and removed redundant styles.
    - Added Tailwind CSS plugins for slotui mixins and presets to streamline utility generation.
  - feat(idae-slotui): migrate all SCSS mixins and component styles to Tailwind plugins, ensure per-component CSS, attribute selectors, and custom properties. Remove legacy slotui-mixins.css.
